text: 4|122|banda anak del mean chomnue  ning ban sang ampeula noh  yeung nung banhchoul puokke tow knong thansuokr del mean t ne  l cheachraen haur  pi kraom vea  daoy puokke nowknong noh chea amt .  karosanyea robsa  a l laoh  kuchea karpit .  tae norna del mean peakyasaamdei pit cheang  a l laoh tiet noh
